```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
source("prob.R")
```
```{r}
s_two_dice <- rolldie(2)
```
```{r}
s_two_dice %>% 
  filter(X1 + X2 == 7) 
```
```{r}
s_two_dice <- s_two_dice %>% 
  mutate(total = X1 + X2)
```
```{r}
s_sum_equals_seven <- s_two_dice%>% 
  filter(total == 7 )
```
```{r}
first_die_even <- s_two_dice %>% 
 filter(X1 %% 2 == 0)
```
```{r}
die2_minus_die1 <- s_two_dice %>% 
  filter(X2 - X1 == -2)
```
```{r}
differ_by_two <- s_two_dice%>% 
  filter(X2 - X1 != 2|-2)
```
